resources.id: [concat(resourceId('Microsoft.OperationalInsights/workspaces/providers', parameters('workspace'), 'Microsoft.SecurityInsights'),'/alertRules/', guid('Operation to Azure AD User'))]
resources.name: [concat(parameters('workspace'),'/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/', guid('Operation to Azure AD User'))]

properties.description: Azure ADユーザーに対する設定変更等が発生しました。
properties.query:
AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(1d) .. now())
| extend Ingest = iff(isnotempty(ingestion_time()), ingestion_time(), TimeGenerated)
| where Ingest between (ago(5m) .. now())
| extend InitiatedApp = iff(isnotempty(parse_json(InitiatedBy).app), parse_json(InitiatedBy).app.displayName, "")
| extend
    InitiatedUser = iff(isnotempty(parse_json(InitiatedBy).user), parse_json(InitiatedBy).user.userPrincipalName, ""),
    InitiatedUserId = iff(isnotempty(parse_json(InitiatedBy).user), parse_json(InitiatedBy).user.id, ""),
    InitiatedIpAddress = iff(isnotempty(parse_json(InitiatedBy).user), parse_json(InitiatedBy).user.ipAddress, "")
| extend
    TargetUser = parse_json(TargetResources)[0].userPrincipalName,
    TargetUserId = parse_json(TargetResources)[0].id
| where not(tostring(InitiatedBy) == "{}" and Identity == "Microsoft Online Services")
| where InitiatedApp !in~ ("Managed Service Identity", "Windows Azure Service Management API")
| extend ItemId = _ItemId
| extend TempTarget = TargetResources
| mv-expand TempTarget
| where not(TempTarget.modifiedProperties contains 'StrongAuthenticationPhoneAppDetail' and InitiatedUser == 'fim_password_service@support.onmicrosoft.com')
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by ItemId
